text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-research-subject-state-type-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 2 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/research-subject-state-type0.1.0  EnrollmentEnrollment statusThis is a status that can only have a single value at a given point in time. The subject is either on-study or off-study.
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/research-subject-state-type0.1.0  MilestoneMilestone statusOne of a set of milestone events that once they have occurred remain true thereafter. For example once a subject has reached the "Signed Informed Consent" milestone they achieve a status of "Consented" that will be true thereafter, even when they have left the study. For a subject a number of these states can be simulataneously true and should be recorded.

name: R5ResearchSubjectStateTypeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ResearchSubjectStateType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-subject-state-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-subject-state-type|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `ResearchSubject.progress.type`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-subject-state-type|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
